module.name: IVR
module.description: Creates Digital Receptionist (aka Auto-Attendant, aka Interactive Voice Response) menus. These can be used to send callers to different locations (eg, Press 1 for sales) and/or allow direct-dialing of extension numbers.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.10* #8034 *2.11.0.9* FREEPBX-8122 New IVR created from inbound routes does not keep its config *2.11.0.8* Regression from FREEPBX-8265 Options not following what user set them to *2.11.0.7* FREEPBX-8265 Timeout and Invalid destinations can no longer return to calling IVR *2.11.0.6* Add license file *2.11.0.5* #7121 IVR list in alphabetical order *2.11.0.4* #6145 correct query to properly display ivr recording usage *2.11.0.3* #6830, #6898, #6869 *2.11.0.2* #6679 *2.11.0.1* #6106 *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.9* #5882 *2.10.0.8* #5854, reverting r14115 checked in error *2.10.0.7* #5665, corner case migration enhancements *2.10.0.6* #5568 *2.10.0.5* #5587, #5588 *2.10.0.4* #5576 *2.10.0.3* #5515 *2.10.0.2* misc bug fixes *2.10.0.1* version bump *2.10.0.0* rewrite! *2.9.0.5* #5094 *2.9.0.4* #4994 *2.9.0.3* styling adjustments *2.9.0.2* #4799 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #1798, #4655
